channel.title: Moparscape Server Status Page problem
channel.description:
I've registered my server 3 times on Mopar, I have a Linux VPS & I've gone to the page on the VPS and registered an account on the server with the name & password they've given but, but I've yet to get onto the server status page.
I don't know what it is im doing wrong..

item.title: Moparscape Server Status Page problem
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

You don’t login with that info, the system just generates a random username and password to see if your server is online. If it isn’t on the status page either you did something wrong setting it up on the page, or you did something wrong setting up the host.

this^ and i recomend logging into the account it gives you to make sure some spammer doesnt do it by accident (also will say your server is offline)

Read full topic

You don’t login with that info, the system just generates a random username and password to see if your server is online. If it isn’t on the status page either you did something wrong setting it up on the page, or you did something wrong setting up the host.
